TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataListItemEventHandler(object sender, DataListItemEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataListItemEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataListItemEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataListItemEventArgs)
public delegate void DataListItemEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataListItemEventArgs ^ e);
type DataListItemEventHandler = delegate of obj * DataListItemEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示方法，處理 控制項的 和 事件。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目時，會引發事件建立控制項。The event is raised when an item in the control is created. 中的項目時，會引發事件控制項是繫結至來源的資料。The event is raised when an item in the control is data bound to a source. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義的處理常式事件，以計算中的項目價格控制項。The following example demonstrates how to define a handler for the event to calculate the price of items in a control. 這個範例會指定事件處理常式以宣告方式設定的事件處理常式屬性上控制項。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, setting the event handler for the attribute on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListItemDataBound/CS/datalistitemdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListItemDataBound/VB/datalistitemdataboundvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定事件處理常式，並以程式設計方式將它加入中的事件`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListItemDataBound2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListItemDataBound2/CS/datalistitemdatabound2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListItemDataBound2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListItemDataBound2/VB/datalistitemdatabound2vb.aspx#1)]
